description:
Compact , portable and fits nicelyon bench-top (erase desktops and table tops)

•  Touch operation,Fixed speed of 3,000rpm for rapid mixing of samples

•  Powerful and efficient 12V DC brushless motor is smooth operation and has long life

•  Foot pad design secures the mixer in place and does not wobble during operation

IP21 MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Mixers in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Mixers with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
